# THIS FILE HAS BEEN GENERATED BY THE BUILD CONFIGURATION SYSTEM - DO NOT EDIT

set(MINECPP_CONTROLLER_INCLUDE_DIR ${MINECPP_CONTROLLER_DIR}/include/minecpp/controller)
target_sources(minecpp_controller
    # Source files
    PRIVATE
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/BlockManager.cpp
        ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/RootItem.cpp

    # Header files
    PUBLIC
        ${MINECPP_CONTROLLER_INCLUDE_DIR}/BlockManager.h
        ${MINECPP_CONTROLLER_INCLUDE_DIR}/RootItem.h
)

# Subdirectories
add_subdirectory("block")
add_subdirectory("item")
